story.text: On this page we begin to write together with the aim of forming a mutual understanding of the overlaps between the work of [[Bjarne Berg Wig]] and the __Institute of Learning Organizations__ - [https://www.learnorg.global/ learnorg.global]

> Our Purpose: 
To reach Millions of improvement culture leaders

All organizations wanting to survive in a complex and rapidly changing environment, need to transform into a real learning organization. Learning organizations are a system of people who master the art of learning together. In this environment, work is seen as a continuous learning process rather than simply a way to execute tasks.
Through sensei mentorship, e-courses, and on-site training we offer more than 30 years of experience to leaders and organizations to make changes that last. [[Bjarne Berg Wig]]

# Transformation through dialogue: 

Our sensei partnership is helping leaders to learn faster through challenging and dialogue. Leadership for complex systems needs systems thinking and deep understanding of the hidden drivers of improvement and innovation. Whether you are advanced in system thinking or just now starting to use the method, we recommend you enlist the expertise of our sensei mentor to help you with learning and growing through your journey.
I also embrace this  - the tool - of the new version of Wiki:  as a way of meta-learning  : to learn by thinking together and by writing together which encourages [[slow]], [[thoughtful dialogue]].

The [[Learning Garden]] and the work I do with [[David Bovill]], and our collective community  - we really bridge the corporate world of consultant and accelerate with a dynamic community of Young Adults.
